Package com.shouldis.bitset

Interface WordFunction

public interface WordFunction
Functional interface used in conjunction with BitSet.apply(int, WordFunction). apply(long) should represent a function used to manipulate the bits within the words of a BitSet. Useful for performing more complex operations outside the suite of typical bitwise operations.
Author:
Aaron Shouldis

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static WordFunction REVERSE
    WordFunction used to reverse the order of bits within the argument word.

    WordFunction used to reverse the order of bits within the argument word.

  • Field Details

    • REVERSE

      static final WordFunction REVERSE
      WordFunction used to reverse the order of bits within the argument word.

  • Method Details

    • apply

      long apply​(long word)
      Function used to perform operations on the words within a BitSet.
      Parameters:
      word - the original word to manipulate.
      Returns:
      the manipulated word.

    • hangingReverse

      static WordFunction hangingReverse​(BitSet set)
      WordFunction used to reverse the order of bits within the argument word. Performs the operations of REVERSE, but only appropriate for the last word of the specified BitSet set, or BitSets of the same size.
      Parameters:
      set - the BitSet to generate the reverse function for.
      Returns:
      the function used to reverse the final word in set.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if set is null.

    • shiftR

      static WordFunction shiftR​(int distance)
      WordFunction used to shift the bits within the argument word to the right.
      Parameters:
      distance - how far to shift the bits to the right.
      Returns:
      a function representing a shift by distance bits.

    • hangingShiftR

      static WordFunction hangingShiftR​(BitSet set, int distance)
      WordFunction used to shift the bits within the argument word to the right. Performs the operations of shiftR(int), but only appropriate for the last word of the specified BitSet set, or BitSets of the same size.
      Parameters:
      set - the BitSet to generate the right shift function for.
      distance - how far to shift the bits to the right.
      Returns:
      the function used to shift the final word in set.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if set is null.

    • shiftL

      static WordFunction shiftL​(int distance)
      WordFunction used to shift the bits within the argument word to the left.
      Parameters:
      distance - how far to shift the bits to the left.
      Returns:
      a function representing a shift by distance bits.

    • hangingShiftL

      static WordFunction hangingShiftL​(BitSet set, int distance)
      WordFunction used to shift the bits within the argument word to the left. Performs the operations of shiftL(int), but only appropriate for the last word of the specified BitSet set, or BitSets of the same size.
      Parameters:
      set - the BitSet to generate the left shift function for.
      distance - how far to shift the bits to the left.
      Returns:
      the function used to shift the final word in set.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if set is null.

    • rotateR

      static WordFunction rotateR​(int distance)
      WordFunction used to rotate the bits within the argument word to the right.
      Parameters:
      distance - how far to rotate the bits to the right.
      Returns:
      a function representing a shift by distance bits.

    • hangingRotateR

      static WordFunction hangingRotateR​(BitSet set, int distance)
      WordFunction used to rotate the bits within the argument word to the right. Performs the operations of rotateR(int), but only appropriate for the last word of the specified BitSet set, or BitSets of the same size.
      Parameters:
      set - the BitSet to generate the right rotate function for.
      distance - how far to rotate the bits to the right.
      Returns:
      the function used to shift the final word in set.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if set is null.

    • rotateL

      static WordFunction rotateL​(int distance)
      WordFunction used to rotate the bits within the argument word to the left.
      Parameters:
      distance - how far to rotate the bits to the left.
      Returns:
      a function representing a shift by distance bits.

    • hangingRotateL

      static WordFunction hangingRotateL​(BitSet set, int distance)
      WordFunction used to rotate the bits within the argument word to the left. Performs the operations of rotateL(int), but only appropriate for the last word of the specified BitSet set, or BitSets of the same size.
      Parameters:
      set - the BitSet to generate the left rotate function for.
      distance - how far to rotate the bits to the left.
      Returns:
      the function used to shift the final word in set.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if set is null.

    • combine

      static WordFunction combine​(WordFunction first, WordFunction second)
      Creates a WordFunction which performs the two specified WordFunctions first and second in sequence.
      Parameters:
      first - the first WordFunction to be applied to the word argument.
      second - the second WordFunction to be applied to the result of first.
      Returns:
      a WordFunction which applies both first and second.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if first or second are null.

    • sequence

      static WordFunction sequence​(WordFunction... functions)
      Creates a WordFunction which performs the specified array of WordFunctions functions in sequence starting at index 0.
      Parameters:
      functions - the list of WordFunctions to sequence.
      Returns:
      a sequenced WordFunction containing each of the WordFunctions in functions.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if functions, or any of the WordFunctions in functions are null.
